short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows your to manage your opened Windows and Tabs on Chrome. Drag and Drop to rearrange them or export as bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tabs Manager is a simple and easy way to manage your opened tabs and windows

View all the tabs and windows you have opened
Drag and drop to reorganize tabs into other windows
Open a new window to store your tabs
Export all tabs in a window into a bookmarks file (compatible with Chrome)

A lot more can be done, but we need your input
Please give us your feedback on what features you would like to see introduced (or on anything else)
